summary: A test suite that validates and benchmarks the collective pipeline mechanisms used for distributed matrix multiplication in the Pallas framework, employing various helper utilities for data prefetching, DMA transfers, synchronization, and kernel execution.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and performance of Pallas collective operations (all‑gather and reduce‑scatter) under different optimization strategies, enabling early detection of regressions and providing latency/throughput metrics for production readiness.
